text: You forgot that we were playing strip poker?
Really, Sayori? You forgot what we were playing?
That's really just like you, isn't it?
Eh... no, it really isn't, Sayori...
Well... those are the rules of the game, Sayori...
I'm pretty sure it's actually a cardigan, Sayori...
...but I don't really think the name matters, in the end.
W-Wait, Sayori, don't you still have your--
Jeez. That was a really close call for you, wasn't it?
Are you going to forget anything else during the game, I wonder...
Y-Yeah, I think you're going to have to go shirtless this time, Sayori.
Well... I never would've imagined I'd see Sayori do this...
Good luck, Sayori...
I-Is that really going to help...?
It's, uh, perfectly okay to be nervous, Sayori.
Sayori? Sayori! ...she's spacing out again, I see.
You'll make it through this, don't worry!
S-So, uhm... Sayori's taking off her bra... ahaha...
S-So, everyone! Let's keep going...!
I-It looks like you have no choice but to be, uhm... nude, Sayori.
T-There goes nothing...?
I, uhm... I can try and look away, Sayori?
S-Sayori's really going to finger herself in front of us...?
Y-You haven't done this in a while, Sayori...?
T-That's it for Sayori, I see...
Jeez. You forgot what we were playing? ...Just like you, really.
Jeez, seriously? You forgot we were playing strip poker? ...well, that's Sayori for you, I guess...
I figured you would do something like that.
...Jeez. Next round, please.
Yes, Sayori. You have to strip. Could you please get it over with?
...you know what? Sure. It's whatever you say it is, Sayori.
...It's nothing, Sayori.
I guess I've lost... what's so surprising, Sayori?
Well, I guess I've lost... why are you so surprised, Sayori?
...I'm somewhat surprised. I didn't think it'd be this long before I took anything off...
Nope! These shoes aren't in uniform!
Ahaha... sorry, Sayori!
Yeah, just the shoes, Sayori. Sorry!
Ehehe, I was waiting for someone to notice that~!
Really, Sayori... don't get mad at me just for playing to win, ehehe~!
Ehehe~ just wait, Sayori...
Well... I guess I was just unlucky!
...Really, Sayori? Just because I've lost twice so far?
Hmm... should I...?
No, I'm not, Sayori! ...I think these look cuter, though.
Anyways, I'll just take these stockings off...
...Nah. I'll just play things safe for now, ehehe.
I mean... it's not something you'd notice unless you specifically looked for it, right?
I'll be waiting to see that, Sayori!
I'm playing to win, Sayori. After all... I'd like to avoid ending up like you, if I can!
Hmm... yeah! The blazer's coming off next... but I wonder, could I...?
Hehe... I don't really have any other choice, Sayori. I wonder, though... could I...?
Ehe... sure, Sayori! I don't really have anything else I could take off... but... let me see, could I...?
Uhm... I think you were just seeing things, Sayori.
Uh... nothing happened, Sayori! Don't worry about it!
Uhm... you didn't miss anything, Sayori! Nothing happened!
(Is she even listening to me...?) Really, nothing happened!
You just blanked out for a second, Sayori. And, uhm... I took off two things at once, this time.
I... uh... decided to take off two things this time, Sayori! No need to worry!
...an astute observation, Sayori.
...yes, Sayori, I took my shirt off. That's a brilliant observation.
W-Well, uhm... okay then?
Y-Yes, Sayori. I get embarassed when I have to take my skirt off in front of other people, like ~player~...
J-Jeez... It's not like I'm u-used to stripping down in front of other people, like ~player~...
D-Didn't you get nervous when you had to do this, Sayori?
E-Eh? Really, ~player~? I... uhm... I don't mind...
J-Just... uhm... let me take this off...
J-Jeez... I'm just going to take this off quickly...
T-There's no need to get that defensive over me, Sayori... e-even if ~player~ is staring...
I-I guess we both are, Sayori...
I... uhm... don't mind if you stare, ~player~...
Jeez... how am I losing to Sayori, of all people...?
I-- I still have clothing left, Sayori! And... actually, wait...!
I guess so, Sayori... wait! Hang on!
Actually, wait! I can... just... take these off...!
Ehehe... I-I can just take my hair ribbons out!
Oh, right! I still have my hair ribbons!
Ehehe... y-you know? I-I'm actually kind of, uhm... warming up to being in only my underwear!
Hmm... you know? I-I'm kinda warming up to this... maybe I should let my hair down in more ways than one, ~player~!
Heh. That was a pretty smart move, right ~player~?
You'll see, Sayori! And so will you, ~player~!
Well... if I have to do this, I might as well cut loose, hm?
Ehehe. Why don't you just ignore Sayori over there and just watch me, ~player~?
Soo~oo? Do you like what you see, ~player~?
Hehe. I guess there's a lot you don't know about me, Sayori~!
Hehe. Are you surprised too, ~player~?
Well, since it's the last thing I have... I might as well show off, right?
Ehehe... well, here~ goes~ nothing~!
Ehehe... Yep! I might as well, Sayori~!
Well... here~ goes~ nothing~ ~player~~!
Just let me slip this off~...
Ehehe. Just ignore the look of panic on Sayori's face and focus on me, okay ~player~?
Ehehe. Just ignore Sayori having a meltdown over there and focus on me, okay ~player~?
I bet you think I couldn't be like this, hmm~ ~player~?
Well... if I'm unlucky enough to lose to even you, Sayori, I just have to... adapt, right?
Honestly, ~player~, if you wanted to see this, you could have asked! But this is fun too, I guess~!
Well... that's it, I guess. Buuut... I guess the really interesting parts have yet to come, ~player~!
Aaand... that's it~! This is me! All of me...
Well, this is... all of me, ehehe...
W-Well, I wasn't expecting to have to do this in front of ~player~ and Sayori, but...
Jeez... I wasn't expecting to have to do this in front of ~player~, Natsuki, and Sayori, but...
Jeez... I wasn't expecting to have to do this in front of ~player~, Yuri, and Sayori, but...
Jeez... I wasn't expecting to have to do this in front of the entire Literature Club, but...
~player~, I know you're a sweetheart, but... I didn't think we'd be here with other people! Or perhaps... you're into girl-on-girl, ehehe~?
U-Uhm... maybe you should lie down if you're not feeling well, Sayori?
If you're not feeling well, Sayori... maybe you should lie down?
O-Oh, jeez, this is going to be embarassing, isn't it...
W-Well, uhm... I don't have any other choice, do I?
I--I'm just going to take my shirt off, then... uhm, Sayori... could you please stop staring at me?
J-Jeez, Sayori... could you please stop staring at me like that?
Sayori? Sayori! ...she's not listening, is she?
Sayori? Hey, Sayori! ...she's spacing out again, isn't she?
Y-You don't have to remind me, Sayori...
A-Anyways, uhm...
...I didn't think you'd be so excited to see my panties, Sayori.
Sayori's been acting a bit strange... was it because of my slip-up earlier...?
Uhm... thanks, Sayori?
Uh, yeah... it seems so, Sayori.
Ehehe... Sayori looks like she's thinking of something lewd, doesn't she?
Well... that's it! This is all of me.
W-Well, I wasn't expecting to have to do this in front of ~player~ and Sayori, but...
Well, here goes nothing... Sayori? What's with that look?
Well, here I go... hm? What's with that look, Sayori?

Wait, Sayori! What are you--!
Ehehe~! Relax, Monika, this will only take a second...
Joint Dialogue 2: Ehehe~! Relax, Monika, this will only take a second...

text:
W-Wait, Sayori?! What are you--!
Ehehe... just let me take it from here, Monika~!
Joint Dialogue 2: Ehehe... just let me take it from here, Monika~!

text:
MMmmfff!
Monika...!

O-Oh, wow, that was...
Kyaaaa! What happened to me?!

O-Oh, wow, Sayori... you were...
Kyaaaa! What am I doing?!
T-That really was, uhm... surprising, Sayori, but... uh, I kinda liked it...

Mmm!
Really, Monika, just relax~!

Ah!
Ehehe~!

S-Sayori...?
Ehehe... you really need to lighten up, Monika~!
Joint Dialogue 2: Ehehe... you really need to lighten up, Monika~!

text:
Hm!
Aha!

A-Ah!
What if... I tried this...?

O-Oh!
You're so tense, Monika... loosen up, okay~?
Joint Dialogue 2: You're so tense, Monika... loosen up, okay~?

text:
M-Mmmm...
Hehe... you're so wound up, Monika...
Joint Dialogue 2: Hehe... you're so wound up, Monika...

text:
E-Eep!
Let it all flow, Monika...

Hmm!
Relax, Monika...

Ohh...
Mhmm...

...
Ehe, she just kinda melted in my hands~!
Joint Dialogue 2: Ehe, she just kinda melted in my hands~!

text:
D-Don't stop, Sayori...
I won't, Monika... trust me~!

D-Don't stop...
Almost there~!

S-Sayori...?
Ehehe... you really need to lighten up, Monika~!
Joint Dialogue 2: Ehehe... you really need to lighten up, Monika~!

text:
A-Ah!
What if... I tried this...?

Ah!
Ehehe~!

Mmm!
Really, Monika, just relax~!

H-Hurry up and join us, ~player~...
This'll be fun to watch~

...I'm tied up, ~player~ is stripping... this feels so surreal...
Just go with it, Monika~!
Joint Dialogue 1: ...I'm tied up, ~player~ is stripping... this feels so surreal...

text:
Hmm... I think ~name~'s lost this round.
Ah! So what are you going to take off this time, ~name~?
Joint Dialogue 1: Hmm... I think ~name~'s lost this round.
Joint Dialogue 2: Ah! So what are you going to take off this time, ~name~?

text:
Are you sure you don't want to take off anything else, ~name~?
Aww... really?
Joint Dialogue 1: Are you sure you don't want to take off anything else, ~name~?

text:
Oh, how boring... oh well~!
Eh? Sayori, what are you-- hng!
Joint Dialogue 2: Eh? Sayori, what are you-- hng!

text:
Oh, that's it...?
How boring~!

Really? That's all?
It's still something, I guess~

That's it?
Are you trying to stall, ~name~?

I guess that's it...? Oh well, back to Monika~
Ah, wait--!
Joint Dialogue 1: I guess that's it...? Oh well, back to Monika~

text:
...oh well, back to Monika~
W-Wait--!

Oh, ~name~'s taking off something pretty big, this time.
Ah, really?
Joint Dialogue 1: Oh, ~name~'s taking off something pretty big, this time.

text:
Ooo, really, ~name~? That?
Not much left to lose...

We'll get the rest off in time, I suppose...
Ehe~!
Joint Dialogue 1: We'll get the rest off in time, I suppose...

text:
It looks like ~name~ only has a few more pieces to go?
It seems so.
Joint Dialogue 1: It looks like ~name~ only has a few more pieces to go?

text:
...At least you won't be the only one exposed, ~name~?
Oh, ~name~'s going to go topless, isn't she?
Joint Dialogue 1: ...At least you won't be the only one exposed, ~name~?
Joint Dialogue 2: Oh, ~name~'s going to go topless, isn't she?

text:
...At least you won't be the only one exposed, ~name~?
Oh, ~name~'s going to go topless, isn't he?
Joint Dialogue 1: ...At least you won't be the only one exposed, ~name~?
Joint Dialogue 2: Oh, ~name~'s going to go topless, isn't he?

text:
D-Don't worry, ~name~! You're not, uhm, the only one in an embarassing situation, here!
Ehehe... you won't be alone, ~name~!
Joint Dialogue 1: D-Don't worry, ~name~! You're not, uhm, the only one in an embarassing situation, here!

text:
He~eey, we match, ehehe!
Sayori's right. I'm not feeling much pressed against my back...
Joint Dialogue 2: Sayori's right. I'm not feeling much pressed against my back...

text:
Pretty average, aren't they, ~name~?
Oooh, you're just like Monika!

Oh, are those why you're here, ~name~?
...I would have worded that a bit more delicately, Sayori. But you're probably correct.
Joint Dialogue 2: ...I would have worded that a bit more delicately, Sayori. But you're probably correct.

text:
I wonder if we'll be able to get the rest of your clothes off?
Ehehe... you look good, ~name~!
Joint Dialogue 1: I wonder if we'll be able to get the rest of your clothes off?

text:
You don't have to hide it anymore, ~name~.
Eeehh... I think I can see it underneath his ~clothing~...?
Joint Dialogue 1: You don't have to hide it anymore, ~name~.
Joint Dialogue 2: Eeehh... I think I can see it underneath his ~clothing~...?

text:
So, does the... roof match the... windows? Or, wait, uhm, was it... floor and curtains?
...I think you mean carpet and drapes, Sayori.
Joint Dialogue 1: So, does the... roof match the... windows? Or, wait, uhm, was it... floor and curtains?

text:
You don't have much longer left, ~name~...
Mmhmm~!
Joint Dialogue 1: You don't have much longer left, ~name~...

text:
Well, uhm. At least it's there?
Whoa, that's tiny, isn't it?
Joint Dialogue 1: Well, uhm. At least it's there?

text:
You seem pretty excited, ~name~.
Is it because of Monika and I?
Joint Dialogue 2: Is it because of Monika and I?

text:
Jeez, that's pretty big, isn't it?
Hmm... is that why ~name~'s at this table?
Joint Dialogue 1: Jeez, that's pretty big, isn't it?
Joint Dialogue 2: Hmm... is that why ~name~'s at this table?

text:
I guess we'll never answer the question.
Oh, you shave, ~name~?
Joint Dialogue 1: I guess we'll never answer the question.

text:
Does that answer your question, Sayori?
...eh? That's an actual question?! I thought it was just something people said!
Joint Dialogue 1: Does that answer your question, Sayori?
Joint Dialogue 2: ...eh? That's an actual question?! I thought it was just something people said!

text:
That's it for ~name~, right?
That makes three of us~

So I guess that makes three of us...
Ehehe~! This'll be fun to watch, won't it, Monika?
Joint Dialogue 1: So I guess that makes three of us...
Joint Dialogue 2: Ehehe~! This'll be fun to watch, won't it, Monika?

text:
Are you going to tie up ~name~ too, Sayori?
Ehehe... nope! I only want to do this with you, Monika!
Joint Dialogue 1: Are you going to tie up ~name~ too, Sayori?
Joint Dialogue 2: Ehehe... nope! I only want to do this with you, Monika!

text:
Off you go, ~name~~!
This feels so surreal...

I wonder if Monika will sound like that~?
E-Eh? Sayori, wha--?
Joint Dialogue 1: I wonder if Monika will sound like that~?

I-- I wonder if that's what Sayori sounds like when she...
